medium_escort.description: Guard the noble on their journey through dangerous territory

medium_escort.name: EscortWizard

hard_escort.name: EscortProphet

notes.rarity_system: Weight determines quest appearance probability - higher weight = rarer quests
notes.usage: Escort quests involve protecting NPCs during travel. Easy escorts have low ambush chance and immortal NPCs, medium escorts involve important figures with consequences, hard escorts feature legendary NPCs with high danger and time limits.
notes.ambush_chance: Percentage chance of encounter during escort (20-90%)
notes.npc_can_die: If true, quest fails if NPC dies; if false, NPC is immortal
